title.rendered: Paws for Humanity presents Storyteller Phillip Gulley

content.rendered:
Paws for Humanity

THREE OAKS, MICHIGAN, UNITED STATES, May 3, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — 14671 Three Oaks Road Three Oaks, MI 49128
www.pawsforhumanity.org

Contact: Beth Bollenbach

beth@pawsforhumanity.org

773-497-2604

Paws for Humanity presents Storyteller Phillip Gulley

Paws for Humanity proudly presents Storyteller Phillip Gulley at the Acorn Theater in Three Oaks, Michigan, Friday, June 2nd, 2023! Gulley, a Quaker pastor from Indiana, will be speaking of community, and the connection and wisdom we gain with animals.

The shared wisdom and insight of Gulley at this event will support Paws for Humanity, an animal sanctuary offering unique opportunities for animals and people to connect, learn and grow from each other. It will feature a silent auction also benefiting the programs and services of Paws for Humanity, people helping animals helping people.

Paws for Humanity is an animal sanctuary located outside of Three Oaks, Michigan and is home to 37 (and counting) animals, each having a story to tell, gifts to teach and love to share. Everyone is invited to tour and connect with the animals, come to a facilitated workshop, or visit with one of the therapy dogs. Equine assisted learning and support services are also offered at the sanctuary. Paws for Humanity is a community minded organization, here for the community and supported by the community. Fundraisers support the facility and programs, such as Phillip Gulley at the Acorn Theater.

Paul Harvey is quoted as saying, “The tales Phillip Gulley unveils are tender and humorous…filled with sudden, unexpected, lump in the throat poignancy”. Come out and enjoy an evening of community and storytelling at the Acorn Theater while supporting Paws for Humanity!

Tickets available at https://www.acornlive.org/events/phillip-gulley/

Beth Bollenbach
Paws for Humanity
+1 773-497-2604
beth@pawsforhumanity.org

You just read:

News Provided By

May 03, 2023, 15:00 GMT
